"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559b03eb636872329e0009da#post_559b03eb636872329e0009da
I know what you mean!

Like for starters, MGS. MGS is a really serious game but holy shit all the goofy shit that happens in that game.

And in its context it makes complete sense! Like Ocelot Meowing.

Or NANO MACHINES. Hell even some of the Characters are just plain Goofy. Like the Pain.

Or the Nerdy Anime guy (Why do I always forget his name)

[spoiler]EDIT: I like Anime Style a lot. (That is the works of Gainax/Trigger/Khara. Not quite 100% Kawaii-bullshit, but not exactly like Akira (tiny faces) either)[/spoiler]
